thread.title: New Heathrow runway would lead to massive increase in pollution, says Boris
thread.title_full: New Heathrow runway would lead to massive increase in pollution, says Boris | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: New Heathrow runway would lead to massive increase in pollution, says Boris
text:
Play video The Mayor of London, Boris Johnson, said today that a new runway for Heathrow would mean a massive increase in noise pollution and fumes.
Last updated Wed 1 Jul 2015 Read more 30 updates Heathrow recommended for new runway Travel Heathrow Boris Johnson
